data: She was so dainty a little figure that the bare-armed women in the doors of the lands and closes turned and looked after her with enjoyment untinged even with envy.
doors of the lands and closes
Oxenham, John, 1852-1941; Manton, G. Grenville (George Grenville), 1855-1932 [Illustrator]
